body:

* fix tests by @Snawoot in https://github.com/Snawoot/postfix-mta-sts-resolver/pull/88
* allow unicode requests by @Snawoot in https://github.com/Snawoot/postfix-mta-sts-resolver/pull/91

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Snawoot/postfix-mta-sts-resolver/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

* upgrade to aioredis v2 by @bjoe2k4 in https://github.com/Snawoot/postfix-mta-sts-resolver/pull/79

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Snawoot/postfix-mta-sts-resolver/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.0

name: SNI compliance
body: This release introduces SNI complance as defined in RFC 8461. This new default behavior is not compatible with Postfix versions prior to 3.4, so this release contains breaking change. However, old behavior can be restored with option `require_sni: false` in zone config. See PR #64 for details.

name: Proactive policy fetch support
body: Credits to @galme!

name: Hardening release
body: Switched to internal netstring protocol parser to avoid issues with pynetstring

name: Cover smarthosts case
body: This release covers smarthosts case (#49). Thanks to @galme! (#50)

name: Reworked Docker image
body:
* Smaller Docker image based on Alpine Linux
* Hardened container security
* Revised recommended docker run commands (cleanup and hardening)

Thanks to @SISheogorath!

name: Async logging
body: Introduces non-blocking logger

name: Minor bugfix
body: Minor bugfix and refactoring; introduces 100% test coverage

name: Fix query parsing
body: This release contains important fix of query parsing issue which could be causing to incorrect daemon responses.

name: Split dependencies
body:
This release splits main package dependencies into optional extras in order to reduce efforts of distro packages maintainers.

Changes:
* Installation procedure changed. Now full-featured package is pulled with `pip3 install postfix-mta-sts-resolver[sqlite,redis]` command
* Changed default config location to untangle it from postfix config directory. New location is `/etc/mta-sts-daemon.yml`

name: Minor update
body: * Manifest application requests with User-Agent header

name: SQLite improvements
body: Switched to aiosqlite 0.10.0 which more precisely fits connection pooling demands

name: Fix Python3.5 compatibility
body: Fixes Python3.5 compatibility

name: Stability and performance improvements
body:
* Fixes wait_closed() issue.
* Added thread pooling, timeouts and WAL for SQLite cache.
* Added cache grace feature: do not update and refresh records which are too fresh.

name: SystemD notify support
body: This release introduces sd_notify in daemon and allows finer reload control

name: Persistence
body: Added cache persistence in SQLite3 file database and Redis

name: Stable release
body:
* Added seamless restart/reload/upgrade and process load balanding
* Graceful shutdown

name: Hardening release
body:
* Improved FreeBSD rc scripts
* Rewritten server handler to eliminate potential resource leak
* Assured daemon signal reception with new signal handling mechanism
* Code refactoring

name: Improvements and fixes
body:
* Documentation improvements
* Flexible handling of pycares responses now handles both `bytes` and `str` TXT values

name: Security improvements
body:
* Security improvement: restrict size of MTA-STS policy server response in order to avoid DoS
* Codestyle fixes

name: New release with improved support materials and documentation
Proxy support
body: Added proxy support for HTTPS resolver. Now mta-sts-daemon and mta-sts-query respect HTTPS_PROXY and NETRC environment variables.

name: Windows support
body: This release introduces support for MS Windows

name: Minor improvements
body:
* Changed storage interface to async for future extension
* Skipping lookup of internal destinations if such are detected

name: Initial release
body: Initial release.
